abstract: Plaintiffs in dismissed Supreme Court case accusing Wal-Mart of discrimination against women file new bias case, this time narrowing class to women in California only.
snippet: After the Supreme Court threw out a sex-discrimination case against Wal-Mart, the plaintiffs are trying again by narrowing the class to women in California only.
lead_paragraph: After the Supreme Court threw out a sex-discrimination case against Wal-Mart, the plaintiffs are trying again by narrowing the class to women in California only.

headline.main: Female Wal-Mart Employees File New Bias Case
headline.print_headline: Female Wal-Mart Employees File a New Bias Case
headline.seo: Women File New Class-Action Bias Case Against Wal-Mart
